<<<<<<< HEAD
A proclamation appointing all passes to ships to be granted hereafter by the High-admiral, his deputes, judges and officers Scotland. Privy Council. Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty, Edinburgh : Anno Dom. 1680.
Caption title. Royal arms at head of text; initial letter. Dated at end: Given under Our Signet, at Edinburgh, the sixth day of May, one thousand six hundred and eighty years; and of Our Reign the thirty two year. Signed: Will. Paterson, Cl. Sti. Concilij. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======
